name: NSCollectionLayoutSpacing
desc: An object that defines the space between or around items in a collection view.

items.name: class func fixed(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a space equivalent to the specified number of points.

items.name: class func flexible(CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a space equivalent to or greater than the specified number of points, depending on the available space.

items.name: var spacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The floating-point value of the space.

items.name: var isFixed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the space is fixed to a specific number of points.

items.name: var isFlexible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the space is flexible.
